title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.7 - Admission of general public; charge optional
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.7 - Admission of general public; charge optional

State Regulations

No licensee shall restrict the general public from
admission to games of chance periods, unless prior written permission is
obtained from the commission. A fee may be charged by any licensee for
admission to any game or games of chance conducted under any license issued
under the Games of Chance Licensing Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4622.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
